actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-233 to extend for an additional 12 months (until July 1, 1976) the eligibility of supplemental security income recipients for food stamps.

summary.text: Extends for an additional 12 month period ending July 1, 1976, the eligibility of recipients of Social Security supplemental security income benefits to receive food stamps.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-233 to extend for an additional 12 months (until July 1, 1976) the eligibility of supplemental security income recipients for food stamps.
